If you are excited about the season two premiere of A&E’s hot docu-series Born This Way< you better hurry up and to book your trip to Orlando for The Arc’s 2016 National Convention and International Forum! This year we will be playing host to the full cast of Born This Way and giving our attendees an opportunity to meet them during a special autograph signing. In addition to our special guests, attendees can look forward to networking with leaders in the disability rights movement. From passionate self-advocates and families, to the professionals that make up The Arc’s network, this is an event not to be missed! This year we look forward to partnering with Inclusion International once again and playing host to an international audience. We hope to see you there! Register today.
